summary: V1.5 - Adds armored horses replacing each cities horse with a unique armor set. Plus Shadowmere and Frost.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]
This is now available as a modders resource, feel free to use in your mods, just give credits. You do not need to contact me for permission, though please do feel free to send me links to show off your work. If its good I may link to it here.
[/size]

[size=3]
[b]
Version 1.5 Video Reviiew by SkoomaKuma 
[youtube]dRYa4eawTRk[/youtube]


Version 1.5:
- Frost has a new Custom Armor!
- Shadowmere Now uses a Daedric Style Armor!
- New Leather Horse Armor for Riften! 
- Nordic Beer Bottle fixed
- NPC Dialogue and Voice (should be) fixed 
- NPCs appearing with armored horses (should be) fixed
- Essential/Invulnerability removed from all horses, to attempt better compatibility with \"Better Horses\" mod. Please use that mod for horse invulnerability.

:::::::::::::::: D E S C R I P T I O N ::::::::::::::::
[/b]
Tamriel is a dangerous place. Protect your horse from danger with this beautiful handcrafted armor! 
This mod adds armored horses, replacing each cities buyable player horse with a unique armored horse. This mod is compatible with BETTER HORSES which adds horse STORAGE, horse invulnerability, and horse AI. The normal saddles are still used by NPCs. 



Whiterun: Nordic Steel Horse Armor
Markarth: Dwarven Horse Armor
Windhelm: Ebony Horse Armor
Riften: LEATHER Horse Armor
Solitude: Dragonbone Horse Armor
Frost: Altered Model & Texture from Sader325\'s Divine Saint Mod

There is and ingame NPC guide (NOT A VENDOR) located at the whiterun stables to answer any common questions you may have. 

If your horse has no armor, you may need to select a horse in the console and quickly enter \"disable\" then \"enable\" (most likely a compatibility issue) to refresh the model. Also (use with caution) you can try console \"kill\" and \"resurrect\" on target.
[b]
:::::::::::::::: C O M P A T I B I L I T Y ::::::::::::::::
[/b]
NOT FULLY COMPATIBLE WITH BETTER HORSES OR HORSES FOR FOLLOWERS
Many including myself CAN get it to work 100% but noone can pinpoint why.

COMPATIBLE WITH DAEDRIC ARMOR RETEXTURES (horse uses it too!)

COMPATIBLE WITH DRAGON ARMOR RETXTURES (horse uses it too!)

COMPATIBLE WITH LEATHER ARMOR RETXTURES (horse uses it too!)

COMPATIBLE WITH NORDIC STEEL & SAVIORS HIDE ARMOR RETXTURES (horse uses it too!)

[b]
::::::::::::::::::  L I N K S ::::::::::::::::::
[/b]
Heroic Dwarven Armor Retexture: (so you & horse can match)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11517

Divine Aegis With A Custom Horse Armor by Sader 325:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9109

Mstik Elven Armor With A Custom Horse Armor by Sader 325:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5600

Better Horses:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10579&navtag=file/images.php?id=10579&tab=3

Horses for followers:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11193&navtag=file/images.php?id=11193&tab=3

My Vicious Weapon Pack:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6383

My Plants+Herbs HD Retex:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1546

[b]
:::::::::::::::: C R E D I T S ::::::::::::::::

Sader325\' - Divine Saint Mod

Nivea - Nifskope Help


:::::::::::::::::: F A Q ::::::::::::::::::

Q: Can you make an equipable & craftable horse armor?
A: Tytanis has incorporated this feature into his amazing mod using some of my armors. Its available here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1601&navtag=file/images.php?id=1601&tab=3

Q: My horses have no armor
A: If your horse has no armor, you may need to select a horse in the console and quickly enter \"disable\" then \"enable\" (most likely a compatibility issue) to refresh the model

Q: I THOUGHT HORSE ARMORZ COSTS MONEY???
A: Send your $2.50 Here: https://american.redcross.org/site/SPageServer?pagename=ntld_main&s_src=RSG00000E017&s_subsrc=glgen&gclid=CITJrfuw_q4CFYbe4AodZg_v1Q


Q: WHY U NOT HAZ MOAR ARMORZ?????
A: Thanks for all the feedback everyone! I am done with additional horse armors for now.
[/b]
[/size]
